pullrequest.title: updated arat.world to reflect specifications of the ARAT test

content.raw:
I've finished updating the object poses in my branch with the following caveats (please consider merging in my changes from arrange_plugin_arat_world_scpeters):

* We don't support water pouring simulation for task `grip_1` ([gazebo issue 1300](#!/osrf/gazebo/issue/1300/water-pouring-simulation-for-arat-grip_1))
* There are supposed to be pegs attached to the `wooden_case` in `grip_2` and `grip_3` ([gazebo_models issue 21](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/issue/21/wooden_case-should-have-pegs-in-grip_2-and))
* The `ball_bearing` is escaping the `round_tin_*` meshes in `pinch_[12]`. We should thicken the meshes or adjust the contact parameters ([gazebo_models issue 20](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/issue/20/ball-bearing-escapes-the-round_tin_-meshes))
content.html:
I've finished updating the object poses in my branch with the following caveats (please consider merging in my changes from arrange_plugin_arat_world_scpeters):

  • We don't support water pouring simulation for task grip_1 (gazebo issue 1300)
  • There are supposed to be pegs attached to the wooden_case in grip_2 and grip_3 (gazebo_models issue 21)
  • The ball_bearing is escaping the round_tin_* meshes in pinch_[12]. We should thicken the meshes or adjust the contact parameters (gazebo_models issue 20)
